Package uk.org.taverna.server.client

Provides classes for interacting with a Taverna Server instance.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
InputPort  
OutputPort  
Port  
PortValue  
Run The Run class represents a workflow run on a Taverna Server instance.
Server The Server class represents a connection to a Taverna Server instance somewhere on the Internet.
 

Enum Summary
RunStatus An enum to represent the status of a Run on a Taverna Server.
 

Exception Summary
AccessForbiddenException This exception is thrown if the server returns a forbidden error code (403).
AttributeNotFoundException This exception is thrown if the server returns a not found error code (404).
AuthorizationException  
InternalServerException This exception is thrown if the server returns an internal error code (50x).
RunNotFoundException This exception is thrown if the server cannot find the run that has been requested or operated on.
RunStateException This exception is thrown if a Run is in an incorrect state to be manipulated in the way that has been requested.
ServerException This is the abstract superclass of all the exceptions generated by code in this package.
UnexpectedResponseException This exception is thrown if the server returns an unexpected status code for the operation performed.
 

Package uk.org.taverna.server.client Description

Provides classes for interacting with a Taverna Server instance. Use the Server class to manage multiple Runs and effectively recreate the server on the client side. Use the Run class to manage individual runs on a server.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Robert Haines
